EmailTemplate.subject: AMA {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year_Plus_One__c} Pricing Notification

{!CASE(MONTH(Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Current_Date__c),1,"January",2,"February",3,"March",4,"April",5,"May",6,"June",7,"July",8,"August-",9,"September",10,"October",11,"November",12,"December","-???-")} {!DAY(Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Current_Date__c)}, {!YEAR(Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Current_Date__c)}
{!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Account_Local_Name__c} {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Client_Address__c} Attention: {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Primary_Contact__c} <<Primary_Contact_Email>>
SUBJECT: AMA {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year_Plus_One__c} Pricing Notification
Dear User-Customer:
Per the terms of the User-Customer Agreement for AMA Physician Professional Data dated {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Original_Effective_Date__c} between and IQVIA and {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Account_Local_Name__c} (the “Agreement”) , this letter provides written notification that the Agreement will automatically renew for {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year_Plus_One__c}, and as outlined therein, you are responsible for the fees noted below unless you notify IQVIA by the due date of October 31, {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year__c} that you wish to cancel or make changes to Record/Rep counts:
<>
Please reply to this email using the instructions below. If no reply is received by October 31, {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year__c} you will be automatically renewed and invoiced per above.
Renew without changes
Reply with the single word: “Renew” as the first line in the body of the email We will generate an amendment agreement and send for your signature
Renew with changes e.g., if you require changes to Record/Rep counts
Reply with the single word: “Changes” as the first line in the body of the email, followed by a description of the changes you need on subsequent lines. Debbie Murino will contact you for further processing.
Do not renew
Reply with the single word: “Cancel” as the first line in the body of the email We will generate a Cancellation/Data Destruct Letter and send for your signature. You must return the updated and signed letter by October 31, {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year__c}. Pursuant to Section 6.1 of the Agreement, if you wish to cancel the Agreement for {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year_Plus_One__c}, you must provide notice of non-renewal at least sixty (60) days prior to the beginning of the calendar year (by October 31, {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year__c} or you will be invoiced for 2022 fees).
If you require a Purchase Order (PO) to be issued prior to the invoicing of AMA fees, please submit the PO and PO# to Debbie.Murino@iqvia.com at IQVIA by October 31, {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Agreement_Year__c}.
Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter.
Sincerely,
Kerri N. Joseph Senior VP, Finance, USBU
cc: {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName}
